Name: Raygun
Description: Point, shoot, and shock the monster with this rapid fire cosmic classic. Shock the monster with energy bolts that travel up to 40 meters.

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of time required to craft the Raygun.
The base amount of shots given to you when crafting the Raygun.
The range of the Raygun's shots.
The amount of continuous damage required by the Raygun in order to wound or stun the monster.
The starting radius of the Raygun shot hurtbox.
The ending radius of the Raygun shot hurtbox.

DetailedStats.Name: Start to Final Hurtbox Radius Blend Time

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of time it takes for the Raygun shot hurtbox radius to transition from the starting radius to the ending radius.
The amount of time it takes for the Raygun to charge after being crafted.
The amount of time it takes for the Raygun to warm up when initially trying to fire it.
The speed of the Raygun shot.
The amount of damage time applied to the monster per successfully hit shot. The monster is Wounded or Stunned when this time is equivalent to or surpasses the required damage time.
The amount of time it takes for the game to automatically destroy a Raygun shot provided it does not naturally get destroyed.
The amount of time it takes for a successful shot to begin decaying from the monster's stigma.

WeaponMods.Name: Light It Up
WeaponMods.Description:
+ Raygun shots that hit the monster will now reveal the monster's aura to all teens for 1.5 seconds.
- The ammo of the Raygun is reduced by 12%.

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of time the monster's aura is revealed to all teens when shot by a Raygun running Light It Up.
The penalty multiplier applied to the maximum ammunition of the Raygun.

WeaponMods.Name: Burst Energy
WeaponMods.Description:
+ Each Raygun shot that damaged the monster will also restore 0.75% of the teen's total base Life.
- The Raygun's maximum projectile range is reduced by 75%.

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of base Life restored per each successful shot on the monster with a Raygun running Burst Energy.
The penalty multiplier applied to the range of the Raygun shots on a Raygun running Burst Energy.

WeaponMods.Name: Forked Shot
WeaponMods.Description:
+ When fired, the Raygun will now launch 3 shots in a forked formation.
- The Raygun takes an additional 0.2 seconds to begin firing.

Misc.ToolTip: The number of projectiles shot from the Raygun when running Forked Shot.
The difference in degrees per each shot on a Raygun running Forked Shot.
The penalty applied to the warmup time of the Raygun when running Forked Shot.

WeaponMods.Name: Stunning Victory
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The crafting time of the Raygun is reduced by 15%.
- The Raygun can only be crafted in a match after the monster has already been wounded by the Shock stigma.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the Raygun's crafting time while the user has Stunning Victory equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Trick Shot
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The Raygun's projectiles now bounce off of the first surface they hit.
- The crafting time required to build the Raygun is increased by 20%.

Misc.ToolTip: The penalty multiplier applied to the Raygun's crafting time while the user has Trick Shot equipped.
